name: Chocolate Mousse
description: Double chocolate mousse made from premium milk and white chocolate, topped with homemade crumbs.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Exquisite lemon-basil cream in a homemade crust, with meringue cream and lemon gel.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Phenomenally tender cake with white chocolate, cocoa butter, and nuts.

name: Coconut Cake
description: Creamy coconut cake with forest fruit filling, topped with quality white chocolate.

name: Passion Fruit and Mango Cake
description: White chocolate mousse on a crispy base, filled with passion fruit and mango puree.
